summary: A sheriff sees his state senate bid slide out onto the ice when his daughter begins to date the son of a charming but psychologically disturbed woman with whom the sheriff has engaged in a two-decade-long affair.
cast: Jennifer Connelly|Ed Harris|Carrie Preston|Barry Shabaka Henley|Harrison Gilbertson|Kevin Patrick Brown|Tom Van Howe|Ward Burton|Paul Walter Hauser|Emma Roberts|Paul Boocock|Yeardley Smith|Toby Jones|Michele DeSelms|Dennis Rauss|Amy Madigan|Alex Frost|Penny Slusher|Will Zahrn|Meighan Gerachis|Drew Kuhse|Rocky Rector|Kathy Ruark|Jo Yang|Derek Minter|Elic Bramlett|Jack Rutledge|Tristan Peach|Lucas Grabeel|Bradley Matthys|Audrey Morgan|Dan Krauth|Linsay Kus|Joanie Tourison|Dan Waterhouse|Dan Schippers|Garrett Clayton|Mike Ancrile|James Barry|Jay J. Bidwell|Justin Calkins|David Scott Diaz|P.J. Edwards|Dennis Favreau|Stephen C. Forsell|Stephen Fosner|Ryan Genther|Heather Kanig|Diane M. Leach|Anne Lockhart|Juice Lopez|David Roetman|Daryl M. Simpson
title: Virginia
